attributes.action: Please investigate The Labour Party for undermining democracy. Thank you
attributes.background: Many members of the Labour Party are complaining of being unfairly prevented from voting in this 2016 leadership election (documented by both mainstream and social media). We the undersigned expect democracy to be respected and upheld at all times by all political parties represented by M.P.s.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Labour Party, not the UK Government or Parliament.
